description: Detects the usage of particular AttributeLDAPDisplayNames, which are known for data exchange via LDAP by the tool LDAPFragger and are additionally not commonly used in companies. Author: xknow @xknow_infosec. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Companies, who may use these default LDAP-Attributes for personal information
name: Suspicious LDAP-Attributes Used
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5136" AND AttributeValue:* AND winlog.event_data.AttributeLDAPDisplayName:("primaryInternationalISDNNumber" OR "otherFacsimileTelephoneNumber" OR "primaryTelexNumber"))
